package.description:
A fake /list_controllers Service.
For robots using controllers outside the ROS Controller Manager system. It provides a /list_controllers Service that returns a list of user-specified controller names, and returns their state as 'running'.
This is required as part of the Manipulation Pipeline, where the object_manipulator node calls the /list_controllers Service to check that the appropriate arm controller is running, before it attempts to grasp an object.
package.author: David Butterworth
